title: Hans im Glück
rewritten_script: Imagine if the most popular kid in school, with thousands of friends and a perfect social media image, was secretly miserable. That's the story of Hans, who's got it all on the surface, but struggles with self-doubt and insecurity. But here's the twist: Hans is a real person, and his journey is a reminder that even the most seemingly perfect lives can be hiding a deeper truth.
style_notes: Start with a surprising and relatable fact to grab the audience's attention
Use a conversational tone to make the script feel more engaging and personal
